Sql.CDATA: IF EXISTS ( SELECT * FROM SYS.views WHERE name = 'v_LumCostSplit' AND SCHEMA_ID = SCHEMA_ID('dbo') ) DROP VIEW [dbo].[v_LumCostSplit] GO CREATE VIEW v_LumCostSplit AS SELECT [Batch].[UsrSplited], [Batch].[CompanyID], [Batch].[Module], [Batch].[BatchNbr], [Batch].[Status], [Batch].[FinPeriodID], [Batch].[CuryID], [Batch].[Description] as 'BatchDescription', [Batch].[CreatedByID], [Batch].[CreatedDateTime], [Batch].[LastModifiedByID], [Batch].[LastModifiedDateTime], [Account].[AccountID], [Account].[AccountCD], [Account].[Description] as 'AccountDescription', [Account].[Type] as 'AccountType', [GLTran].[Qty], [GLTran].[DebitAmt], [GLTran].[CreditAmt], [InventoryItem].[InventoryID], [InventoryItem].[InventoryCD], [InventoryItem].[Descr] as 'INDescr', [GLTran].[Released] as 'GLReleased', [GLTran].[TranID] as 'GLTranID', [GLTran].[TranType] as 'GLTranType', [GLTran].[LineNbr] as 'GLTranLineNbr', [InventoryItem].[StdCost], [InventoryItem].[StdCostDate], ABS(CASE WHEN([GLTran].[DebitAmt] + [GLTran].[CreditAmt] = 0 OR ([GLTran].[Qty] = 0)) THEN 0 ELSE ([GLTran].[DebitAmt] + [GLTran].[CreditAmt]) / [GLTran].[Qty] END) AS 'UnitCost', (CASE WHEN CASE WHEN [GLTran].[Qty] <> 0 THEN ([GLTran].[DebitAmt] + [GLTran].[CreditAmt]) - ([InventoryItem].[StdCost] * ABS([GLTran].[Qty])) ELSE 0 END = 0 THEN '' ELSE 1 END) AS 'CostDiffer', (CASE WHEN [GLTran].[Qty] <> 0 THEN ([GLTran].[DebitAmt] + [GLTran].[CreditAmt]) - ([InventoryItem].[StdCost] * ABS([GLTran].[Qty])) ELSE 0 END) AS 'STDCostVariance', [GLTran].[SubID] from Batch left join Ledger on Ledger.CompanyID = Batch.CompanyID and Ledger.LedgerID = Batch.LedgerID left join Branch on Branch.CompanyID = Batch.CompanyID and Branch.BranchID = Batch.BranchID inner join GLTran on GLTran.CompanyID = Batch.CompanyID and GLTran.BatchNbr = Batch.BatchNbr and GLTran.Module = Batch.Module inner join Account on Account.CompanyID = GLTran.CompanyID and Account.AccountID = GLTran.AccountID left join BAccount on BAccount.CompanyID = GLTran.CompanyID and BAccount.BAccountID = GLTran.ReferenceID inner join InventoryItem on InventoryItem.CompanyID = GLTran.CompanyID and InventoryItem.InventoryID = GLTran.InventoryID where Batch.CompanyID > 0 and Account.Type = 'E'
